content.p:
Instructors who were influential at CSULB For project motivation:
Professor Robert Allisonfor inspiring talks of success stories within my field
Dr. Min He for showing the importance of embedded design in software design
Dr. Phuong D. NguyenFor motivation in web scripting

Special Thanks:
CSULB, and especially the ACM chapter. For hosting my web portfolio and providing guidance in the field of computational science
Go Beach!
